name: Attempting to log on with an invalid credentials - Invalid Device and Region

testSteps.description: When I attempt to log into the Application oneview using Device rter in Region TYR using my Staff ID "17101" and Password "Dublin16"

children.description: Login staff member: User [staffID=17101, staffFirstName=Philip, staffLastName=Sibley, region=TYR, application=oneview, platform=rter, password=Dublin16, branchName=DIT Aungier Street, nsc=931012]

testSteps.description: Then I should receive a Validation Error

userStory.storyName: In order to prevent unauthorized access to non-AIB-staff members, as a system admin, I want valid users to authenticate before they access customer information

title: Attempting to log on with an invalid credentials - Invalid Device and Region
